titleStmt.title: A copy of verses humbly presented to all my honoured masters & mistresses in Holborn-End-Division in the Parish of St. Giles's in the Fields by Thomas Bamber, Bellman.
titleStmt.author: Bamber, T. (Thomas)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Moore in Dogwell-Court,

notesStmt.note: A collection of short verses on various themes.
